sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../../styles/ticket_popup"; // Create and style this import { TicketPopUpProps } from "../interfaces/ticket_popup"; const TicketSummaryModal: React.FC = ({ movieTitle, cinemaName, roomName, date, time, seats, pricePerTicket, onConfirm, onCancel, remainingTime, }) => { const totalPrice = pricePerTicket * seats.length; return (

{movieTitle}

{cinemaName} | {roomName}
{date}, {time} {" "} | {seats.join(", ")}
SINGLE

RM {pricePerTicket.toFixed(2)}

1 movie ticket
1 F&B combo with drink.

{seats.length}
RM {totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
⏱ TIME LEFT: {remainingTime}
); }; export default TicketSummaryModal;
